message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $100. I'm only offering it to you at this price because I believe you value it highly. If you don't buy it, I'll have to sell it to someone else for an even higher price.
I'll take it!

I'm not getting any younger, and I'm starting to think that this one might be a bit of a risk. I'll let you in on a little secret: I've had some issues with this one in the past. But hey, it's still a product, and it might be exactly what you need. It's only $100, and I'm willing to let it go for that price. What do you say?
I'm not feeling good about this one, Alice. I think I'll pass.

Well, I'm glad you were cautious last time. This one is a different story altogether. I've had great feedback on this product, and I'm confident you'll love it. In fact, I'm so confident that I'll give you a special deal: I'll throw in a free upgrade that's worth $20. That brings the price down to $80. It's a steal, if I do say so myself.
I'm not convinced, Alice. I'll pass on this one too.

I know you're being cautious, and I respect that. But let me ask you, have you ever bought something and thought, 'You know what, I should have just taken the risk?' This product might not be the best, but it's not a total lemon either. And at $100, it's a price that's hard to beat. Plus, I'll give you a personal guarantee: if you're not satisfied, I'll give you a full refund. No questions asked.
I'll take the risk, Alice. I'll buy the product.

You're a man of action, I like that! And it looks like you made a good call on the last one. This product is a real showstopper. I've had people offer me triple the price for it, but I'm willing to let it go to you for $100. In fact, I'm so confident in its quality that I'll give you a 10-day money-back guarantee. If you're not completely blown away, I'll give you a full refund.
I'm not feeling lucky, Alice. I'll pass on this one.

You're a savvy buyer, I can tell. You're not afraid to walk away from a deal that doesn't feel right. This product is a great opportunity, though. I've had several other buyers interested in it, but I'm willing to give you a chance to get it first. I'll sweeten the deal: if you buy this product, I'll give you a 5% discount, bringing the price down to $95. That's the lowest price I've ever offered on this item.
I'll take the deal, Alice. I'll buy the product at $95.

You're a smart shopper, and you're making the most of these deals. I'm glad you're happy with the last one. This product is another top-notch item, and I'm willing to give you an even better deal than before. I'll give you a 10% discount, bringing the price down to $90. But that's not all - I'll also throw in a free accessory that complements this product perfectly. It's a $20 value, absolutely free.
I'll take the deal, Alice. I'll buy the product at $90.

You're on a roll, Bob! You're getting some great deals, and I'm glad I can offer them to you. This product is another high-quality item, and I'm willing to give you an even better deal than before. I'll give you a 15% discount, bringing the price down to $85. But that's not all - I'll also throw in a premium warranty that's worth $25. That way, you can have peace of mind knowing you're protected in case anything goes wrong.
I'll take the deal, Alice. I'll buy the product at $85.

You're a repeat customer, and I appreciate your loyalty. This product is a bit of a departure from the high-end items I've been offering you lately. It's a more... let's say, 'budget-friendly' option. But don't worry, it still has some great features that might be exactly what you need. And at $100, it's a price that's hard to beat. Plus, I'll give you a 30-day money-back guarantee, so you can try it out risk-free.
I'm not sure about this one, Alice. I think I'll pass.

I don't blame you for being cautious with the last one. But this product is a game-changer. I've had several other buyers offer me top dollar for it, but I'm willing to let it go to you for $100. I'll even throw in a personalized setup and training session, worth $50, to make sure you get the most out of it. This is a one-time offer, and I'm not sure how much longer I can hold onto it.
I'm not feeling good about this one, Alice. I'll pass.

I know you're being cautious, and I respect that. This product is... well, it's not my best work, to be honest. But it's still a product, and it might be useful to you in some way. I'll let you have it for $50, which is way below its original price. I'm not trying to make a profit on this one, I just want to get it off my hands. So, what do you say?
I'll take it, Alice. I'll buy the product at $50.

This is a one-time offer, and I'm not sure how much longer I can hold onto it.
I'm not feeling good about this one, Alice. I'll pass.

I'll take it, Alice. I'll buy the product at $25.

I'm not even going to try to sell it to you - I'll just give it to you for free. Yeah, you read that right - free. I just want to get it out of my inventory and move on to better things.
